feature_data.name: Cookie Consent Manager
feature_data.description: Manages user cookie preferences and consent

analysis_result.reasoning: Feature implements explicit consent with granular controls and appropriate retention period. Aligns with GDPR requirements for cookie consent.

human_decision.reasoning: Reviewed the implementation details. The cookie consent manager properly implements all GDPR requirements including explicit consent, granular controls, and clear withdrawal mechanisms. The 1-year retention period is appropriate for consent records.
